title: Hélène et les Garçons
resume:
Hélène et les Garçons was a French sitcom that aired from 1992 to 1994. It is a spin-off from the series First Kisses, and follows Hélène Girard and her friends in their life as students.
It was created in 1992 by Jean-Luc Azoulay. Hélène, the main character, is performed by the actress Hélène Rollès who is also a famous singer in France.
